Name: Zambezi
Description: Located in the northeast, Zambezi is named after the Zambezi River. It is a rich region in wildlife, particularly in the Caprivi Strip.

Name: Khomas
Description: Khomas is home to Namibia s capital, Windhoek. It is the political, economic, and cultural center of the country.

Name: Erongo
Description: Erongo is located along the Atlantic coast, known for its coastal towns such as Swakopmund and Walvis Bay. It also features beautiful beaches and the Namib Desert.

Name: Otjozondjupa
Description: Otjozondjupa is a central region of Namibia, home to the capital of the region, Otjiwarongo. It is known for its natural landscapes and wildlife.

Name: Hardap
Description: Hardap is located in the southern part of Namibia, known for its agricultural production, including farming and vineyards. It also contains the Hardap Dam.

Name: Karas
Description: Karas is situated in the southernmost part of Namibia and features a diverse landscape, including the Namib Desert and part of the Fish River Canyon.

Name: Kunene
Description: Kunene is located in the northwestern region of Namibia, known for the beautiful Damaraland and the Etosha National Park.

Name: Omusati
Description: Omusati is situated in the northern part of Namibia. It is a rural area with a significant agricultural presence, particularly maize farming.

Name: Ohangwena
Description: Ohangwena is a northern region of Namibia, known for its agricultural activities and its proximity to the Angolan border.

Name: Omulunga
Description: Omulunga is located in the northern part of Namibia. It is an area with a heavy focus on agriculture and traditional living.
